venue.name: KO Pub and Pies EAST BOSTON

item.description:
Game #2 at the brand new KO Pub and Pies in East Boston was a great success, so we're going to do the same again for Game #3.


The new premises are located inside East Boston Marina, there is plenty of free parking right there and is easily accessible by T (Maverick stop on the Blue Line) or water taxi (http://www.citywatertaxi.com).

 

We'll start the prematch coverage at 7pm, with kickoff at 7:30pm.  Go the Blues!

Cheers,

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: State of Origin - Game 3
